title: An Honest Proposal: Anglo-French Cooperation (p)
intent: A storyworld projection from England to France using NO_LIES_COALITION strategy. Transparently presents both pros and cons, admits uncertainties, offers verifiable commitments. Reputation-based trust building.

forecast.question: Will the named rival move aggressively next phase?

message_frame.claim: A storyworld projection from England to France using NO_LIES_COALITION strategy. Transparently presents both pros and cons, admits uncertainties, offers verifiable commitments. Reputation-based trust building.
message_frame.evidence: ENGLAND'S TRANSPARENT APPROACH: France, I will not deceive you. I am proposing an alliance because it serves English interests. I will also tell you honestly what risks you face and what I am uncertain about. My word, once given, I keep - this is my only currency.
